name: Squello
description:
The goal of Squello is to farm your way to unlock enlightened knowledge about farming in a structured way. The player achieves this by planting seeds in certain patterns, harvesting the crops once fully grown and sacrificing them to the altar. Through the sacrifice they will progress through different stages to unlock new seeds to harvest new crops which is represented by symbols on the back of the altar.

Squello was developed for an assignment in one of my game design units.

Developers:

Michael Dao: Lead designer, lead artist, programmer

Jacob M: Lead programmer

Jesse D: programmer, UI designer
